body.para: for someone who join adsence2 1/2 week ago(july,26), you seem to be doing very good. I wish i could make money this fast. lol

quote.quotepara: good morning, I am very new in adsense. my total earnings cross US$ 100 just yday. but till date i not recd the Pin no. If i get that Pin no before 25th , can i get the payment on 1st week of september. (My payment mode is secured express delivery). swaiting for your reply
